title: The minimum area of the subplot/plots of an erstwhile contiguous land, of which the entire potential is proposed to be utilized on the other subplot/plots of the same erstwhile contiguous land, shall be 2000 sq
clause_text: The minimum area of the subplot/plots of an erstwhile contiguous land, of which the entire potential is proposed to be utilized on the other subplot/plots of the same erstwhile contiguous land, shall be 2000 sq.mt.
section: Circumstances warranting preparation of a layout or sub- division/amalgamation: A layout or subdivision/amalgamation shall be submitted for the following:
